name: We're Closed Sorry
description:
If You Experience controller bug when you first launch the app (Unable to move or do anything), please close the app and start again. We are working on fixing this issue.

We're closed Sorry is a metroidvania in which the player controls both a titular hero traversing the interior of a retro supermarket store and the owner of the store. Immerse in an action-adventure combating bugs, finding secrets, and becoming a dreamt hero.



As the owner of the store, the game only begins when you close your shop allowing all creepy things and bugs to lurk in the dark terrorizing the store and your products. Use strategy as the owner to control the way you play. Different supplies in your stock will affect gameplay.


Explore the ins and out of the a metroidvania-like world and focus on finding out its secrets and upgrading your strength. Find pills to become stronger.
Pills allow you to use different abilities. The world of Sorry We're closed is packed with secrets which can only be found when you explore it.
Use your memory skills to map out the world and back-track.
